description: Universal agile/docs-as-code system with 36 commands and 8 specialized subagents (v2.13.2 - Moved validate-commands and release to templates for user .claude/commands/)

plugins.name: AgileFlow
plugins.description: Universal agile/docs-as-code system combining Scrum, Kanban, ADRs, and docs-as-code. Framework-agnostic command pack for managing epics, stories, decisions, research, and multi-agent collaboration with automation features.
